post.summary: Fails the order. Status changes to failed. State of the agreement doesn't change except the status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of entity

created.description: Contains details about the creation event of the entity.

updated.description: Contains details about the most recent update event of the entity, if applicable.

AuditBag.description: Represents a container for audit-related events, including creation and updates.

at.description: Indicates the date and time when the event occurred.

by.description: Represents the identity of the user who performed the event, if applicable.

AuditCreatedEvent.description: Represents an audit event for the creation of an entity.

at.description: Indicates the date and time when the event occurred.

by.description: Represents the identity of the user who performed the event, if applicable.

AuditUpdatedEvent.description: Represents an audit event for the update of an entity.

BillingAttachmentType.description: Represents the type of billing attachment.

errorCode.description: Represents the error code associated with the billing entity.

errorMessage.description: Represents the error message providing details about the issue.

id.description: Represents the unique identifier for the error, if applicable.

message.description: Represents the detailed message associated with the error, if applicable.
message.example: Failed to process the billing entity due to missing data.

BillingError.description: Represents an error related to a billing entity.

operations.description: Represents the identifier used for operations in the billing system.

vendor.description: Represents the identifier used for vendors in the billing system.

BillingExternalIds.description: Represents external identifiers associated with billing entities.

BillingType.description: Represents the type of billing process.

id.description: The unique identifier of the charge.

externalIds.description: Contains external identifiers associated with the charge.

search.description: Contains search-related details for the charge.

period.description: Represents the period during which the charge is applicable.

quantity.description: Indicates the quantity associated with the charge.

price.description: Contains pricing details for the charge.

segment.description: Represents the segment associated with the charge.

description.description: Contains a description of the charge, if applicable.

journal.description: The journal associated with the charge, if applicable.

ledger.description: The ledger associated with the charge, if applicable.

customLedger.description: The custom ledger associated with the charge, if applicable.

parent.description: The parent charge, if this charge is part of a hierarchy.

billingType.description: Indicates the billing type of the charge, defaulting to automated.

upload.description: Contains the upload status and related details for the charge, visible to vendors or operations.

licensee.description: The licensee associated with the charge, if applicable.

agreement.description: The agreement associated with the charge, if applicable.

subscription.description: The subscription associated with the charge, if applicable.

order.description: The order associated with the charge, if applicable.

item.description: The product item associated with the charge, if applicable.

authorization.description: The authorization details associated with the charge, if applicable.

statement.description: The statement associated with the charge, if applicable.

statementType.description: Indicates the type of statement associated with the charge.

processing.description: Contains the processing status and related details for the charge, visible to operations.

erpData.description: Contains ERP-related data for the charge.

buyer.description: The buyer associated with the charge.

vendor.description: The vendor associated with the charge.

seller.description: The seller associated with the charge.

attributes.description: Contains additional attributes for the charge.

split.description: Contains details about the charge split, if applicable.

Charge.description: Represents a charge in the billing system.

id.description: The unique identifier of the charge.

externalIds.description: Contains external identifiers associated with the charge.

ChargeRef.description: Represents a charge in the billing system.

documentNumber.description: The document number associated with the charge.

orderType.description: The type of order associated with the charge.

externalDocumentNo.description: The primary external document number associated with the charge, if applicable.

externalDocumentNo2.description: An additional external document number associated with the charge, if applicable.

yourReference.description: A reference provided by the customer for the charge, if applicable.

ChargeAttributes.description: Represents additional attributes associated with a charge in the billing system.

value1.description: The first value of the description, if applicable.

value2.description: The second value of the description, if applicable.

ChargeDescription.description: Represents a description of a charge.

reference.description: A reference identifier for the charge, if applicable.

invoice.description: The invoice identifier associated with the charge.

vendor.description: The vendor identifier associated with the charge.

ChargeExternalIds.description: Represents external identifiers associated with a charge.

currency.description: Specifies the currency details for the charge, including purchase and sale values.

markup.description: Represents the markup value applied to the charge, visible to operations.

margin.description: Represents the margin value calculated for the charge, visible to operations.

unitPP.description: Represents the unit purchase price of the charge, visible to vendors or operations.

PPx1.description: Represents an total purchase price value for the charge, visible to vendors or operations.

unitSP.description: Represents the unit sale price of the charge, visible to clients or operations.

SPx1.description: Represents an total sale price value for the charge, visible to clients or operations.

ChargePrice.description: Represents the pricing details of a charge, including currency, markup, margin, and unit prices.

criteria.description: The search criterion used for the charge.

value.description: The value associated with the search criterion.

ChargeSearch.description: Represents a search criterion and its value for a charge.

subscription.description: Contains subscription-related search details for the charge, if applicable.

order.description: Contains order-related search details for the charge, if applicable.

item.description: Contains item-related search details for the charge, if applicable.

ChargeSearchBag.description: Represents search-related details for a charge.

percentage.description: The percentage of the charge allocated to this split.

ChargeSplit.description: Represents the details of a charge split.

ChargeStatus.description: Represents the various statuses a charge can have in the billing system.

status.description: Indicates the current status of the charge.

errors.description: Contains a list of error messages associated with the charge, if any.

ChargeStatusBag.description: Represents the status and associated errors of a charge in the billing system.

icon.description: Represents the icon linked to the entity, if applicable.

audit.description: Contains audit-related details for the entity.

name.description: Name of the ledger.

billingEndDate.description: The end date of the billing period for the custom ledger.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the custom ledger.

status.description: The current status of the custom ledger.

assignee.description: The user assigned to the custom ledger, if applicable.

price.description: Pricing details associated with the custom ledger.

processing.description: Processing status and related details for the custom ledger, visible to operations.

error.description: Error details associated with the custom ledger, if any.

description.description: The primary description of the line item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item in the line.

unitPrice.description: The unit price of the item in the line.

countryOfUsage.description: The country where the item is used.

contractNo.description: The contract number associated with the line item, if any.

primaryCodeIdentifier.description: The primary code identifier for the line item.

primaryCodeVersion.description: The version of the primary code for the line item.

secondaryCodeIdentifier.description: The secondary code identifier for the line item, if any.

secondaryCodeValue.description: The value of the secondary code for the line item, if any.

msrp.description: The manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP) for the line item.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the line item for concurrency control.

rowVersion.description: The row version of the line item for concurrency control.

parentItemNo.description: The parent item number, if the line item is part of a bundle or group.
